activation.title: Your account is activated!
activation.text: Register now and use all the advantages of our digital power tools Lock Book Docu and Lock Book Draw completely free of charge.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.text:
It seems that your activation has expired, here you can get a new activation email.

<2>Click here for a new activation email

register.info_mail: We have sent an email to <1>{{email}}</1>.
register.info_instructions: The email contains your <1>username</1> and the <4>activation link</4>. Click on the link to activate your Lock Book account. You can then log in with your username and password.
register.info_help: Sending the email can take a few minutes. Didn't receive an email? Check the spam folder or <2>contact us</2>.
register.company_error: This company already exists. Please contact the admin of your company.
register.account_already_registered:
<0><0>Been around for a while?<1>Login<1>Just keep using your existing 'ABS-Lock Book' account.
You do not need to register again!

login.forgot_password_hint: Forgot your password? Select “Forgot your login” to reset your password.

forgot_password.info:
No problem! You can easily reset your password. 
Enter your username for this. We will then send you an email with a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.username_info: firstname.lastname and possibly with a number at the end
forgot_password.check_emails_info: In a few minutes you will receive a message with your username and a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.hint_info: Please note that the link to reset your password is only valid for 24 hours.

forgot_username.title: Forgot username?
forgot_username.text: <0>Can't find your password or username? We will help you. Just use our <2>form</2> or call us at <6>+49 2832 97281-130</6>.</0>

new_password.info: Please choose your password. The password must be at least 8 characters long, including one lower and upper case letter and one number.
new_password.password_changed_info: Excellent! You have successfully reset your password. You can now log in with your new password.
new_password.password_saved_info: Excellent! Your password has been saved successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

new_account_activation.info:
No problem! You can easily get a new activation email. 
Enter your username for this, you can grab it from the last activationmail you received. We will then send you an email with a link to activate your account.
new_account_activation.username_info: firstname.lastname and possibly with a number at the end
new_account_activation.check_emails_info: In a few minutes you will receive a message with a link to activate your account.
new_account_activation.hint_info: Please note that the link to activate your account is only valid for 24 hours.

forgot_username.title: Forgot username?
forgot_username.text: <0>Can't find your password or username? We will help you. Just use our <2>form</2> or call us at <6>+49 2832 97281-130</6>.</0>

form.name: Name
form.password_hint: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including one lower and upper case letter and one number
form.display_assembler_information: Print: contact details of the final user in the documentation
form.terms_accept: <0>If you continue, you agree to our </0><1>Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3><4>.</4>

user_management.title: User Management
user_management.create_user_feedback: The user was successfully created and has received an email. By clicking the activation link in the email the user can activate his account.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Data protection and data security are of the highest priority for us. Therefore, read the following privacy policy carefully.
privacy.link: Here you can <1>view the latest privacy policy</1>

newsletter.title: Interest related information
newsletter.description: We may, from time to time, provide you with interest-related information to offer and explain features, services and benefits that may be of interest to you.
newsletter.newsletter_accept: Receive interest-related information from Lock Book
newsletter.newsletter_reject: I do not wish to receive interest-related information from Lock Book

user.signature_advice: Please note that the signature is only used in the Docu application and app.
user.signature_text_below: Deposit your signature here to easily use it as soon as you complete documentations.

docu.description: Create complete documentation in accordance with DGUV. One object data record, always available - for every assembly, inspection and maintenance.

draw.description: Your professional planning program, easy to use in your browser. Easily create true-to-scale roof sketches for your security systems.

gaeb.description: Upload a GAEB file containing your tender and receive a quotation response within a day for a quick and easy way to kick-start your procurement.

services.use: Which application do you want to use?
services.welcome: Hello {{ firstName }}, welcome to Lock Book!

error.error_text: You may want to go back to Lock Book. If something is broken, you can also report a problem.
error.403: Oops, you don't have permission to access this page.
error.404: Oops, the page you are looking for does not exist.
error.500: Oops, a technical error has occurred.

legal.headline: Terms of use
legal.text: The <2>terms of use</2> and <6>privacy policy</6> have been updated. Agree with these terms to continue otherwise you will be automatically logged out.
